metadata.feature_description: Retrieve list of pages with filtering by parent ID and search key

steps.expected: Root-level pages should be displayed in a tree view
steps.actual: Root-level pages displayed correctly: Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, Community, Search Results, 404 Error Page, Wiki Test, Groups, Test Page One, News, Test Normal Page, Publish Test Page, and others

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Get pages by parent ID (expand child pages)

steps.action: Click [+] expand button next to 'Our Products' page
steps.expected: Child pages of 'Our Products' should be displayed

steps.action: Click [+] expand button next to 'Activity Feed' page
steps.expected: Child pages of 'Activity Feed' should be displayed
steps.actual: Child pages 'My Profile', 'Friends', and 'Messages' displayed under 'Activity Feed'

steps.action: Enter 'News' in the search field and click search
steps.actual: 2 PAGES FOUND: 'News' and 'News SubPage Test' displayed with page details (Page Type, Publish Status, Publish Date, Workflow, Tags)

steps.action: Enter 'XYZnonexistent123' in the search field and click search
steps.expected: No results message should be displayed

steps.action: Enter '<script>' in the search field and click search
steps.expected: Search should handle special characters without errors
steps.actual: Search handled gracefully, returned 'NO PAGE FOUND.' - no errors or crashes

steps.action: Search for 'XSS' to find page with script tags in name
steps.expected: Page with HTML-encoded script tags should be found
steps.actual: 1 PAGE FOUND: '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' page found and displayed with HTML encoding intact

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select child page and view details

steps.action: Click on 'My Profile' child page under Activity Feed
steps.expected: Page details should be displayed with correct parent information
steps.actual: My Profile page selected, details shown with Page Parent: 'Activity Feed', Status: 'Visible', Page ID: 31. Breadcrumb shows 'ACTIVITY FEED > MY PROFILE'

steps.expected: Tree view should show expand/collapse controls and change text accordingly
steps.actual: Tree view shows '[EXPAND ALL]' initially, changes to '[COLLAPSE ALL]' when pages are expanded. Tree structure correctly displays hierarchical page relationships

observations: The Pages module uses a tree-based navigation pattern rather than traditional pagination. This is appropriate for hierarchical page structures.
Search results view shows a different layout with page cards containing detailed information (Page Type, Publish Status, Publish Date, Workflow, Tags).
Pages with special characters in names (like XSS script tags) are properly HTML-encoded and displayed safely.
The BACK TO PAGE button in search results returns to the tree view.
Advanced Filters option is available in search results but was not tested in depth for this feature.
Some pages appear grayed out in the tree view (e.g., 'Activity Feed', 'Search Results', '404 Error Page') indicating they may be hidden from the menu or have special status.
